mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board b JOIN voluboardinfo v ON b.brdno = v.brdno WHERE b.brdtype='vo' order by b.brdno desc limit #{value}, 10
select count(*) from board where board.brdtype='vo'
select b.brdno, b.brdcontent, b.wrdate, b.userid, b.title, b.brdtype, b.userno, v.vbrdno,v.vhour from board b join voluboardinfo v on b.brdno=v.brdno where brdtype='vo' order by v.vbrdno desc
select b.title, b.userid, b.wrdate, b.brdcontent, v.vhour, v.vbrdno from board b join voluboardinfo v on v.brdno=b.brdno where v.vbrdno=#{int}
select brdno from voluboardinfo where vbrdno=#{int}
mapper.insert: insert into board VALUES(null,#{brdcontent},SYS_DATETIME,#{userid},#{title},#{brdtype},select userno from userinfo where userid=#{userid}); insert into voluboardinfo VALUES(null,select brdno from board where title=#{title} and brdcontent=#{brdcontent}, #{vhour});
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, brdcontent=#{brdcontent}, wrdate=SYS_DATETIME where brdno=#{brdno}; update voluboardinfo set vhour=#{vhour} where vbrdno=#{vbrdno};
mapper.select: select brdno from voluboardinfo where vbrdno=#{int}
select cntrname from centerinfo where cntrno=#{int}
